result.execSummary:
The defendant Amanda R Laroche was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $50 fine plus costs. If fine and costs are not paid within 60 days, stay on jail time will be lifted.

Stayed. If Defendant pays fine and costs in full on or before 10/27/15, stay will be permanent. If Defendant fails to pay fine and costs in full on or before 10/27/15, stay will be lifted. Good time and Huber privileges granted. 60 days from sentencing date to report.

defendant.name: Laroche, Amanda R

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Amanda R Laroche in court.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews previous activity. State advises of plea agreement. Court questions Defendant on continued waiver of Court reviews charges, max. penalties, elements. Defendant enters guilty plea to Count 2. Court questions Defendant on rights, finds plea made freely and voluntarily, accepts plea, and finds Defendant guilty of Count 2.  State makes sentencing recommendations. Bond no longer in effect.

Defendant Amanda R Laroche in court. Raymond Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews previous activity. State advises that Defendant did not make an appointment. Defendant didn't realize she had to do that, thought she had to pay her fines, needs more time to pay. Court questions Defendant, who didn't understand that she has to meet with DA to address three charges instead of one.  Status conference scheduled for August 27, 2015 at 11:00 am.
Not to write any checks. Cash bond to be posted by 4:30 on 7/28/15. To be fingerprinted and photographed before leaving Justice Center.

Defendant Amanda R Laroche in court. Raymond Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court questions Defendant on non-appearance. Defendant thought hearing was tomorrow. Court reviews charges, max. penalties, right to counsel. Defendant has not spoken with an attorney. Bond set. Court reviews options regarding Counsel. Defendant wants to try to resolve matter with DA, waives right to Counsel. Court questions Defendant, finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver. Defendant to make appointment with DA. Bond set.  Status conference scheduled for August 20, 2015 at 10:30 am.
Defendant Amanda R Laroche not in court. Raymond Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews Summons and Complaint, will issue warrant if no appearance by end of day.
